LEFT JOIN hmm_member ON asset_info.status_member_id=hmm_member.member_id

LEFT JOIN asset_model ON asset_info.asset_model_name=asset_model.model_name

LEFT JOIN orderby_asset ON asset_info.status_type=orderby_asset.asset_status
LEFT JOIN orderby_model ON asset_model.model_type=orderby_model.asset_model
WHERE asset_info.status_asset_usage LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR asset_info.status_type LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR hmm_member.member_id LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR hmm_member.member_rank LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR hmm_member.member_name LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR hmm_member.member_department LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR hmm_member.member_department_detail LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR asset_info.asset_model_name LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR asset_info.asset_number LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%')

WHERE status_type LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%')
WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%')
WHERE member_name LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%')
WHERE member_department LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%') OR member_department_detail LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%')
WHERE model_type LIKE CONCAT('%' #{search} '%')
